1.title: Judgment Against Samaria and Jerusalem
1.keyEvent: Prophecy of destruction for Israel and Judah's sins

2.title: Condemnation of Oppressors
2.keyEvent: Denouncement of greedy leaders and false prophets

3.title: Corrupt Leaders Rebuked
3.keyEvent: Judgment pronounced on unjust rulers and priests

4.title: Future Glory and Peace
4.keyEvent: Vision of restoration and peace in the last days

5.title: Messianic Prophecy
5.keyEvent: Birth and reign of the coming ruler from Bethlehem

6.title: God's Case Against Israel
6.keyEvent: God's indictment and call to justice and mercy

7.title: Prayer and Hope
7.keyEvent: Confession, lament, and trust in God's mercy
